name: navigaya
tag_list: cloud-browser, browsing-experience, media, adhd, new, video, multimedia, fun
overview:
Navigaya is the next generation of content and multimedia platform that brings together exclusive technology with a deep understanding of how the future browsing experience should look, feel and function. Navigaya is based on grasping the very fundamental nature of The â€œADHD Eraâ€ and thus offering an innovative and exciting user experience never seen before.

Our forefront technology allows us to stream content and at the same time keep the users surrounded by all their favorite features from around the web. Navigaya.com is only one implementation of our real product, which is Navigaya’s platform.

Navigaya’s platform is completely customizable and can be private labeled, preferably in cooperation with heavy content suppliers which can take real advantage of its unlimited capabilities.

milestones.source_description: Navigaya Opens Platform With Free HTML5 Channels For Content Owners
